title: Beauty Report with Amy Morrison 01.18.2018 - 08 PM
description:
TEMPTU, Serious Skincare, and more are sitting down with Amy this tonight on Beauty Report. Amy shares her latest beauty tips and trends. From hair and makeup to skincare and fragrance, it's new every week. 

Watch every Thursday at 7 pm ET. *Prices shown on the previously recorded video may not represent the current price. Visit http://www.hsn.com to view the current selling price.
